BUI

local name

interaction

BuiToggle

HTML Structure
<script type="text/javascript" defer src="/assets/js/module.bui.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" defer src="/assets/js/module.bui.template.js"></script>

<div id="targetElementId" data-bui-toggle="toggle-selector" data-bui-toggle-target="targetElementId">toggle target</div>
<a href="#targetElementId" data-bui-toggle-button="targetElementId">toggle button</a>
javascript
default
var toggleName = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggle-selector"]');
options
var toggleName = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggle-selector"]', {
	// general
	mode: 'normal',
	event: 'click',
	active: false,
	activeClass: 'active',

	disabled: false,
	disabledClass: null,

	focusin: false,
	focusout: false,

	clickout: false,
	clickoutTarget: null,

	// target
	target: null,
	targetClass: 'bui-toggle-target',
	targetActiveClass: 'active',
	targetAttribute: 'data-toggle-target',

	// close
	close: false,
	closeButton: 'button',
	closeButtonArea: null,
	closeButtonClass: 'close',
	closeButtonText: 'close',

	// react target
	reactTarget: null,
	reactTargetClass: null,
	reactTargetActiveClass: 'active',

	// react Parent
	reactParent: null,
	reactParentClass: null,
	reactParentActiveClass: 'active',

	tooltipContainer: '#page',
	tooltipArrowClass: 'tooltip-arrow',

	/* callback */
	onloadCallBack: function() {return false;},
	eventCallBack: function() {return false;},
	activeCallBack: function() {return false;},
	inactiveCallBack: function() {return false;}
});
API
// toggle actions
toggleName.toggle('selector');

// add to toggle plugins
toggleName.appendToggle('selector');
demos
default
var toggleDefault = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggle-default"]');
toggle button

toggle target

inactive buttons
<button type="button" data-bui-toggle-inactive="targetElementId">inactive</button>
toggle button

toggle target

close
var toggleClose = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggle-close"]', {
	close: true
});
toggle button

toggle target

clickout
var toggleClickout = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggle-clickout"]', {
	close: true,
	clickout: true
});
toggle button

toggle target

focusin
var toggleFocusin = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggle-focusin"]', {
	close: true,
	focusin: true
});
toggle button

toggle target

focusout
var toggleFocusout = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggle-focusout"]', {
	close: true,
	focusout: true
});
toggle button

toggle target

reactTarget
var toggleReactTarget = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggle-react-target"]', {
	close: true,
	reactTarget: 'body',
	reactTargetActiveClass: 'active-toggle-react-target'
});
toggle button

toggle target

BuiTab

HTML Structure
<script type="text/javascript" defer src="/assets/js/module.bui.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" defer src="/assets/js/module.bui.template.js"></script>

<div class="tab-display" data-bui-tab="normal">
	<ul class="tab-list">
		<li class="tab-item"><a class="tab-name" href="#tabTarget1"></a></li>
		<li class="tab-item"><a class="tab-name" href="#tabTarget2"></a></li>
		<li class="tab-item"><a class="tab-name" href="#tabTarget3"></a></li>
	</ul>
</div>

<div class="tabTarget1">Tab Target 1</div>
<div class="tabTarget2">Tab Target 2</div>
<div class="tabTarget3">Tab Target 3</div>
javascript
default
var tabs = new buiTab('[data-bui-tab="normal"]');
options
var tabs = new buiTab('[data-bui-tab="normal"]'), {
	// general
	active: false,
	activeClass: 'current',
	initial: 0,

	// tab
	tabItem: '.tab-item',
	tabName: '.tab-name',
	
	// target
	target: null,
	targetClass: 'bui-tab-target',
	targetActiveClass: 'active',
});

  • two
  • three

Tab Target 2
Tab Target 3
